title: jira_utils.py --create-ticket [FILE] schema
description: Schema for JSON input accepted by jira_utils.py via --create-ticket FILE when creating a ticket.

project.description: Jira project key (e.g., PROJ). Equivalent to CLI --project.

issue_type.description: Issue type name (e.g., Task, Bug, Story). Equivalent to CLI --issue-type.

description.description: Plain-text description. Will be converted to Jira Cloud ADF. Equivalent to CLI --ticket-description.

assignee_id.description: Assignee accountId (Jira Cloud). Equivalent to CLI --assignee-id.

components.description: Component names to set. Equivalent to CLI --components.

fix_versions.description: Fix version(s) to set. Equivalent to CLI --fix-versions.

labels.description: Labels to set. Equivalent to CLI --labels.

parent.description: Parent issue key (e.g., PROJ-123). Equivalent to CLI --parent.
